name: Forever Labs
description:
Description

Your animals have grown old and stopped producing, they have earnt themselves a good retirement. In steps Forever Farms, a place for farm animals to spend their golden years in happiness!

Unfortunately, not everything is as good as it first seems! You soon discover it was all a front for Forever Labs, an animal testing facility. With love for your animals in your heart you must break into the facilities to rescue your animals.

Sneak around the guards, hide from the cameras and solve security measures while you search for and rescue your animals before sunrise and the lab opens.

Trailer Game  Objectives
  • Sneak through the Forever Labs facilities
  • Disable alarms to avoid detection
  • Collect single use keys to access lockers to hide from unsuspecting guards
  • Rescue your cages animals and get them out to your get away van
  • Get out before morning when the lab opens
  • Work through each lab with increasing difficultly to rescue all of your beloved animals
Controls

Compatible  with Keyboard and Mouse and Xbox Controller.

Movement - WASD - Left Analog Stick

Interact - Left Click - 'A' Button

Sprint - Space Bar - Right Trigger

Creators

Ben Matthews (Lead Developer, Programmer and Shared 3D Artist)

Joshua Mills ( 2D Artist, Shared 3D Artist)

 Forever Labs Press Kit

To download game please click  the download button. You will be taken to an external OneDrive folder where you must right click the 'Forever Labs' folder and click download. Once downloaded  open the folder and launch the 'Forever Labs.exe'
